name: Little Yellow (hard version)
description:
Little Yellow in hard mode!
  •  Only badass people can complete this phase, but first you'll have to pay!

      

  • RED ENEMIES: Either avoid them by taking low jumps or high jump (depending on the size of the enemy) or you can kill them using the black button, killing will give you 1 point.

 

  • CATS: Cats with no hats disables high jump button for 2 seconds, while cats with hats disables low jump button for 2 seconds.
  
  • POOPY AND ZOMBIE: Can get you dirty for 5 seconds and change Little Yellow`s type of jump.

 

  • ALIENS: Green aliens and UFO change the positions of buttons for 4 seconds.
  • MOTORBIKERS: Steal all your money at once.
  • TANK: Completely invincible, use high jump to escape or small one if you`re precise enough.

The easy mode: https://rgt.itch.io/little-yellow

I hope you enjoy!
